page.title: 09ATTITUDES_NOISE_
page.content: Some residents of Suncroft,Dipton have been complaining about a noise coming from Dean Dove's factory at Harlaw Industrial Estate.They said the noise was like a big fridge. The noise kept her from getting to sleep at night.Their house is 500m. across the road from the factory.The noise has been going on for ten years and they have been complaining about the noise for 2 years.The factory produces man made polyester thread,which is very strong.The noise is not made all the time because the factory closes down frequently.The factory has to do something to reduce the noise within 3 months or they will be taken to court and fined.
